label: Space and Time Gateway (Secrets Proxy)
name: sxtGatewayProxy
description: Integration for Gateway (Secrets Proxy) REST APIs for centralized secrets management, authentication, and SQL proxy operations.

inputParameters.label: User ID
inputParameters.name: userId
inputParameters.description: User identifier for registration, login, or password reset

inputParameters.label: Password
inputParameters.name: password
inputParameters.description: Password for registration or login

inputParameters.label: Join Code
inputParameters.name: joinCode
inputParameters.description: Subscription join code for registration

inputParameters.label: Access Token
inputParameters.name: accessToken
inputParameters.description: Access token used for adding an existing user or converting a session

inputParameters.label: Temp Password
inputParameters.name: tempPassword
inputParameters.description: Temporary password for resetting password

inputParameters.label: New Password
inputParameters.name: newPassword
inputParameters.description: New password for resetting password

inputParameters.label: Session ID
inputParameters.name: sid
inputParameters.description: Session identifier for session-related operations and biscuit management

inputParameters.label: Biscuit Name
inputParameters.name: biscuitName
inputParameters.description: Name of the biscuit for retrieval or deletion

inputParameters.label: Name
inputParameters.name: name
inputParameters.description: Unique name for a new user biscuit

inputParameters.label: Biscuit
inputParameters.name: biscuit
inputParameters.description: Base64 encoded biscuit payload

inputParameters.label: Public Key
inputParameters.name: publicKey
inputParameters.description: Public key associated with the biscuit

inputParameters.label: Resource ID
inputParameters.name: resourceId
inputParameters.description: Resource identifier for permission operations or resource permissions

inputParameters.label: Resource Type
inputParameters.name: resourceType
inputParameters.description: Type of resource

inputParameters.label: Target User ID
inputParameters.name: targetUserId
inputParameters.description: User identifier for setting or removing permissions

inputParameters.label: Access Level
inputParameters.name: accessLevel
inputParameters.description: Access level for permission

inputParameters.label: Key ID
inputParameters.name: keyId
inputParameters.description: Identifier of the API key to delete

inputParameters.label: Description
inputParameters.name: description
inputParameters.description: Description for creating a new API key

inputParameters.label: SQL Text
inputParameters.name: sqlText
inputParameters.description: The SQL statement to execute

inputParameters.label: Query ID
inputParameters.name: queryId
inputParameters.description: Unique identifier for the content query

inputParameters.label: Query Slug
inputParameters.name: querySlug
inputParameters.description: Slug for the content query

inputParameters.label: Biscuits
inputParameters.name: biscuits
inputParameters.description: Optional biscuits for SQL authorization (comma-separated if multiple)
